Question
========

Of 18 subjects, before and after a given effort of force, the heart rate is measured. We want to test whether the average heart rate before and after the effort is equal. Of the 18 differences between pre- and post-measurement the mean is 23 and the standard deviation is 23. The value of the test size of the paired T test is then

Answerlist
----------

* 4.06
* 4.24
* 4.62
* 8.84

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 4.06: Incorrect
* 4.24: Correct
* 4.62: Incorrect
* 8.84: Incorrect
